title: SOP-002 Post-Review Gate - Require Completed Documentation Approvals

comment: Procedural compliance verified. CR-008 addresses a genuine gap identified in INV-001: SOP-002 lacks explicit post-review eligibility criteria. Proposed Section 7.3 defines: (1) execution completion requirements, (2) documentation approval requirements, (3) QA verification responsibilities. Execution plan is complete with 5 items. Proposed text in Section 5 is well-structured and actionable. No TU reviewers required - this is a procedural SOP update with no technical domain content.

Post-review verification per SOP-002 Section 7.3 PASSED. (1) Execution Items: All 5 EIs show COMPLETE with documented evidence - no DEFERRED items. (2) Documentation Status: SOP-002 is EFFECTIVE v4.0 (verified via qms status). (3) Revision Summary: SOP-002 revision_summary correctly references CR-008. This is the first CR verified under the new Section 7.3 requirements that CR-008 itself introduced. All conditions met.
